content:
Summary:

Several websites list numerous React.js fresher job openings in India.  Job boards like Glassdoor, Indeed, and SimplyHired have listings for React.js fresher positions.  Internshala also provides fresher job opportunities, including React.js roles.  These sites offer details like job titles, company names, locations, and sometimes salary information.


Results:

* **Glassdoor:**
    *  [https://www.glassdoor.co.in/Job/react-js-fresher-jobs-SRCH_KO0,16.htm](https://www.glassdoor.co.in/Job/react-js-fresher-jobs-SRCH_KO0,16.htm) - 279 React js fresher jobs
    * [https://www.glassdoor.co.in/Job/reactjs-developer-fresher-jobs-SRCH_KO0,25.htm](https://www.glassdoor.co.in/Job/reactjs-developer-fresher-jobs-SRCH_KO0,25.htm) - 44 Reactjs developer fresher jobs


* **Indeed:**
    * [https://in.indeed.com/React-Js-Fresher-jobs](https://in.indeed.com/React-Js-Fresher-jobs) - 200+ React Js Fresher jobs
    * [https://in.indeed.com/q-fresher-react-jobs.html](https://in.indeed.com/q-fresher-react-jobs.html) - 400+ Fresher React Job Vacancies
    * [https://in.indeed.com/q-react-js-developer-fresher-jobs.html](https://in.indeed.com/q-react-js-developer-fresher-jobs.html) - 200 React Js Developer Fresher Job Vacancies


* **SimplyHired:**
    * [https://www.simplyhired.co.in/search?q=react+js+fresher](https://www.simplyhired.co.in/search?q=react+js+fresher) - 259 react js fresher jobs


* **Internshala:**
    * [https://internshala.com/fresher-jobs/reactjs-jobs/](https://internshala.com/fresher-jobs/reactjs-jobs/) - 3911+ fresher jobs, including React.js


* **Other:**
    * [https://reactjobs.io/](https://reactjobs.io/) - A job board focused on React.js jobs (may have fresher positions).


**Note:**  The number of results may vary depending on the current job market.  It's recommended to check these sites regularly for updated listings.

Summary:

Several websites list numerous React.js fresher jobs in India.  Job boards like Glassdoor, Indeed, and SimplyHired have listings for various roles, including React developer, React JS fresher, and Reactjs developer fresher positions.  These listings often include details like company ratings, salaries, and job descriptions.  Internshala also provides a broader range of fresher jobs, including React-related roles.


Results:

* **Glassdoor:**
    * [https://www.glassdoor.co.in/Job/react-js-fresher-jobs-SRCH_KO0,16.htm](https://www.glassdoor.co.in/Job/react-js-fresher-jobs-SRCH_KO0,16.htm):  279 React js fresher jobs in India.
    * [https://www.glassdoor.co.in/Job/india-react-developer-fresher-jobs-SRCH_IL.0,5_IN115_KO6,29.htm](https://www.glassdoor.co.in/Job/india-react-developer-fresher-jobs-SRCH_IL.0,5_IN115_KO6,29.htm): 290 react developer fresher jobs in India.
    * [https://www.glassdoor.co.in/Job/india-reactjs-developer-fresher-jobs-SRCH_IL.0,5_KO6,31.htm](https://www.glassdoor.co.in/Job/india-reactjs-developer-fresher-jobs-SRCH_IL.0,5_KO6,31.htm): 45 Reactjs developer fresher jobs in India.
    * [https://www.glassdoor.co.in/Job/react-js-jobs-SRCH_KO0,8.htm](https://www.glassdoor.co.in/Job/react-js-jobs-SRCH_KO0,8.htm): 9,028 React js jobs in India (not all are fresher roles).

* **Indeed:**
    * [https://in.indeed.com/q-fresher-react-js-jobs.html](https://in.indeed.com/q-fresher-react-js-jobs.html): 200+ fresher React JS jobs.
    * [https://in.indeed.com/q-react-js-developer-fresher-jobs.html](https://in.indeed.com/q-react-js-developer-fresher-jobs.html): 200 React Js Developer Fresher Job Vacancies.

* **SimplyHired:**
    * [https://www.simplyhired.co.in/search?q=react+js+fresher](https://www.simplyhired.co.in/search?q=react+js+fresher): 259 React js fresher jobs.

* **Internshala:**
    * [https://internshala.com/fresher-jobs/reactjs-jobs/](https://internshala.com/fresher-jobs/reactjs-jobs/): 3911+ fresher jobs in India, including some React-related roles.


**Note:**  The number of results may vary depending on the specific time of your search.  Always review the job descriptions carefully to ensure the role aligns with your skills and experience.

Based on the provided search results, here are some React job opportunities for freshers in Bangalore:

* **Jooble:**  [https://in.jooble.org/jobs-react.js/Bangalore](https://in.jooble.org/jobs-react.js/Bangalore)  -  Lists 232,000+ job vacancies, including React.js positions.  Some may be suitable for freshers.

* **Freshersworld:** [https://www.freshersworld.com/react-developer-jobs-in-bangalore/1515118953365](https://www.freshersworld.com/react-developer-jobs-in-bangalore/1515118953365) -  Specifically lists React developer jobs for freshers in Bangalore.

* **Indeed:** [https://in.indeed.com/q-react-js-developer-fresher-jobs.html](https://in.indeed.com/q-react-js-developer-fresher-jobs.html) -  Searches for "React JS developer fresher jobs" in India.  May yield results for Bangalore.

**Important Note:**  The provided results are not exhaustive.  To find the best fit for your needs, you should explore the listed websites and refine your search further by specifying desired skills, experience levels, and company types.

Unfortunately, I do not have access to real-time information, including event listings specific to freshers.  The provided search results don't focus on events tailored for freshers.  To find machine learning events in Bangalore for freshers, I recommend searching on websites like:

* **Eventbrite:**  Use the search function to specify "machine learning" and "Bangalore" and filter by date.
* **Meetup.com:**  Search for "machine learning" and "Bangalore" and look for groups focused on beginners or freshers.
* **Local Bangalore tech communities' websites/social media:** Check if local tech organizations or universities have relevant events listed.
* **University websites:** Check if any universities in Bangalore are hosting machine learning workshops or events.


These resources will likely provide more relevant results for your specific need.
